alert.note: Alert for Prince George (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 10 at 5:53PM EDT until August 10 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN PRINCE GEORGE...NORTHWESTERN SUSSEX AND EAST CENTRAL DINWIDDIE COUNTIES... At 553 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Carson, or 7 miles east of Dinwiddie, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Carson around 605 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Burgess, Templeton and Reams. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
